generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and directional arrows, indicating it is a road for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks visible along the sides of the road, separated from the road by curbs and trees.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible, including a multi-story structure with balconies on the left and a modern building with a wooden facade on the right.
- vegetation: Trees are present along the sidewalks and in front of the buildings, indicating vegetation.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing bright and clear.
- person: Two people are visible walking on the sidewalk on the left side of the image.
- car: Several cars are parked on the right side of the road, and one car is visible in the distance on the road.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the road, indicating information about road construction.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead, mounted on poles.
- terrain: There is some grass and soil visible in the foreground and along the sidewalks, indicating terrain.
